com.continuuity.weave.api
Interface WeaveRunner

All Known Subinterfaces:
WeaveRunnerService
All Known Implementing Classes:
YarnWeaveRunnerService
public interface WeaveRunner

This interface prepares execution of WeaveRunnable and WeaveApplication.

Nested Class Summary
static interface WeaveRunner.LiveInfo
          Interface to represents information of a live application.

Method Detail

prepare

WeavePreparer prepare(WeaveRunnable runnable)
Prepares to run the given WeaveRunnable with ResourceSpecification.BASIC resource specification.

Parameters:
runnable - The runnable to run through Weave when WeavePreparer.start() is called.
Returns:
A WeavePreparer for setting up runtime options.

prepare

WeavePreparer prepare(WeaveRunnable runnable,
                      ResourceSpecification resourceSpecification)
Prepares to run the given WeaveRunnable with the given resource specification.

Parameters:
runnable - The runnable to run through Weave when WeavePreparer.start() is called.
resourceSpecification - The resource specification for running the runnable.
Returns:
A WeavePreparer for setting up runtime options.

prepare

WeavePreparer prepare(WeaveApplication application)
Prepares to run the given WeaveApplication as specified by the application.

Parameters:
application - The application to run through Weave when WeavePreparer.start() is called.
Returns:
A WeavePreparer for setting up runtime options.

lookup

WeaveController lookup(String applicationName,
                       RunId runId)
Gets a WeaveController for the given application and runId.

Parameters:
applicationName - Name of the application.
runId - The runId of the running application.
Returns:
A WeaveController to interact with the application or null if no such runId is found.

lookup

Iterable<WeaveController> lookup(String applicationName)
Gets an Iterable of WeaveController for all running instances of the given application.

Parameters:
applicationName - Name of the application.
Returns:
A live Iterable that gives the latest WeaveController set for all running instances of the application when Iterable.iterator() is invoked.

lookupLive

Iterable<WeaveRunner.LiveInfo> lookupLive()
Gets an Iterable of WeaveRunner.LiveInfo.

Returns:
A live Iterable that gives the latest information on the set of applications that have running instances when Iterable.iterator()} is invoked.
